attributes.action: reform the House of Lords with at least 75% of members democratically elected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to democratise the House of Lords,reduce Primeministerial and party leader patronage in conjuction with tackling the cash for peerages question the following option should be put before the Commons : Single Transferable Vote elections for at least 75% of the membership from the regions of the UK.
